instructions: Gently lift the dinner plate and set it carefully on the center of the table cloth
Gently lift the salad plate and place it in the center of the dinner plate
Place the napkin in the center of the salad plate
Gently place a wine glass off the top right corner of the dinner plate
Place a water glass to the bottom right of the wine glass, close but not touching
Place a salad fork off to the left of the dinner plate
Place a dinner fork in between the salad fork and the plate
Place a dinner knife, with the blade facing in, to the right of the dinner plate
Place a soup spoon directly to the right and symmetrical to the knife.
